mapper.select: select collect.id , collect.article_id , collect.gmt_create , article.title , article.description , article.views , article.is_excellent_article , category.category_name from bbs_collect as collect join bbs_article as article on collect.article_id = article.id join bbs_category as category on article.category_id = category.id where collect.user_id = #{userId} order by collect.gmt_create desc limit #{current} , #{limit}
